subject: Re: Re: pro X brake
description_text:
Have problems again,this time pedals are disconnecting, after a few
minutes, I have leds but that’s it , in the setup screen it shows
disconnected but if I hit the update button it shows that it is turned and
you can hear my pc beep with random connections, is the usb cable a normal
“printer “ style cable should I try changing the cable, when you wiggle the
cable it gets worse with connect and disconnect. This is the second box you
have sent, I tried the old box and it does the same thing ,, some time it
pops up corrupt usb/pc can not read usb. Please advise.

>>>> Hello
>>>>  I have had the pro x set of pedals for 2 weeks and i am still
>>>> adjusting things but today in an online race my brake pedal went dead no
>>>> light or any thing, I tried a reboot and unplugging but nothing helped if i
>>>> plug the brakes into clutch port it does light up, I did not look to see if
>>>> it will calibrate since I don't want to run it as a clutch please help i
>>>> think the control box is bad, and i have a league points race on the 18
>>>> th no other pedals .
>>>>
>>>

conversations.body_text: Hi 4c farm and racing,     Hello! Please install the Todesk remote desktop tool (no registration required), and provide your ID and temporary password. I’ll assist you remotely to check the pedal issue.  So far, we haven’t encountered pedal disconnection in our internal tests. Since your pedal includes LED lighting, the issue may be due to one of the following:    The USB port used is not USB 3.0, leading to insufficient power;    You're using a USB hub with too many devices connected, which can cause unstable voltage/current on a single USB port;    The USB hub itself might be faulty.    We recommend plugging the pedal directly into a USB 3.0 port on the back of your PC. I will also help you remotely check the system and update the firmware if needed—this should resolve the issue, as it's very unlikely that two ProX controllers would both fail.

What would be a good time to do this I am available at 4:15 central time

Hi 4c farm and racing,  Hello, do you mean right now?

I replaced the cable and nothing happened. I put my old box back on and it
didn’t work at 1st , so I went to your website and manually updated to
2.0.8 and then unplugged the box and plugged back it and it showed
connected, I have not tried the other box , I ran 4/5 races in iracing and
not fults.. can’t say enough about your customer service you guys a great
? thanks so much.

On Wed, Jun 18, 2025 at 4:14 AM service@simsonn.com

Of course I would not mind demoing the new haptic motors , I have some now
that i built with ardrino but I would love to try the new ones.
